snippet: A northwestern Montana man shot and killed the host of “A Rifleman’s Journal” on the Sportsman Channel while the TV personality was visiting the man’s wife, police officials said Friday.
abstract: Wayne Bengston of northwestern Montana shoots and kills Gregory G Rodriguez,  host of A Rifleman’s Journal on Sportsman Channel,  while Rodriguez was visiting Bengston’s wife; police say Bengston also beat his wife and later apparently killed himself.
lead_paragraph: A northwestern Montana man shot and killed the host of “A Rifleman’s Journal” on the Sportsman Channel while the TV personality was visiting the man’s wife, police officials said Friday.

headline.main: Montana: TV Host Shot to Death
headline.print_headline: Montana: Tv Host Shot To Death
